questions.question_text: Akṣharbrahma gurunā yoge Swāminārāyaṇ Bhagwānno āsharo karavāthī hu dhanya chhu, pūrṇakām chhu, niṣhpāp, ________ ane ________ chhu.
questions.explanation: The shlok states 'niṣhpāp, nirbhay ane sukhī chhu.'

questions.question_text: “...amāro draḍh vishvās rākhasho ne kahīe tem karasho to tamane mahākaṣhṭ koīk āvī paḍashe tethī athavā sāt dakālī jevu paḍashe te thakī rakṣhā karashu ane koī ūgaryāno āro na hoy evu kaṣhṭ āvī paḍashe toy paṇ rakṣhā karashu.”
questions.explanation: This quotation is from Vachanamrut Jetalpur 5.

questions.question_text: Dhanyo’smi ________ niṣhpāpo nirbhayah sukhī । Akṣhara-guru-yogena Swāminārāyaṇā’shrayāt ॥ 19 ॥

“Atishay je Moṭā Puruṣh hoy teno je upar rājīpo thāy tenā game tevā malin sanskār hoy to nāsh pāme ane Moṭā Puruṣhno rājīpo thayo hoy to rānk hoy te rājā thāy ane game tevā bhūnḍā prārabdha hoy to rūḍā thāy ane game tevu tene māthe vighna āvanāru hoy te nāsh thaī jāy.”
questions.explanation: This quotation is from Vachanamrut Gadhada Pratham 58.

questions.question_text: “...jene māhātmye sahit nishchay hoy tene em samajāy je, ‘Je divase Bhagwānnu darshan thayu te divasthī ja kalyāṇ to thaī rahyu chhe ane je jīv bhāve karīne māru darshan kare tathā māru vachan māne tenu paṇ kalyāṇ thaī jāy to māre ________ shyo sanshay chhe? Hu to kṛutārth chhu ane je kāī sādhan karu chhu te to Bhagwānnī prasannatāne arthe karu chhu,’ em samaje tene Bhagwānno māhātmye sahit nishchay jāṇavo.”
questions.explanation: The original quote says, 'māre kalyāṇno shyo sanshay chhe?'

questions.question_text: “Jene potānu kalyāṇ ichchhavu tene to Bhagwān ne Bhagwānnā sādhu ethī uparānt bīju kāī jagatmā sukhdāyī nathī.”
questions.explanation: This is a quote from Vachanamrut Gadhada Antya 7.

questions.question_text: jene pratyakṣh pramāṇ draḍh āsharo hoy tene manmā evī ________ na rākhavī je, ‘Hu rakhe marīne bhūt-pret thau ke rakhe Indralokne ja pāmu ke rakhe Brahmalokne ja pāmu!’
questions.explanation: The original quote says, 'manmā evī bīk na rākhavī'.

questions.question_text: Evī āshankā manmā rākhavī nahī; kem je, je evo Bhagwānno bhakta hoy te to Bhagwānnā dhāmne ja pāme paṇ vachmā kyāy tene Bhagwān rahevā de nahī.
questions.explanation: This quotation is from Vachanamrut Gadhada Antya 7.

questions.question_text: Hu to kṛutārth chhu ane je kāī ________ karu chhu te to Bhagwānnī prasannatāne arthe karu chhu,’ em samaje tene Bhagwānno māhātmye sahit nishchay jāṇavo.”
questions.explanation: The original quote says 'je kāī sādhan karu chhu'.

questions.question_text: ‘Hu rakhe marīne bhūt-pret thau ke rakhe Indralokne ja pāmu ke rakhe Brahmalokne ja pāmu!’
questions.explanation: This is a quote from Vachanamrut Gadhada Antya 7.
